# Graph Color Palettes

Are you looking for a highly contrasting color palette that works well in graphs?

Here is a collection of color palettes that I like to use.

## R's ggplot

One of the most common triadic color schemes for statstical plots is the base color palette from R's ggplot package:

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
bar_data <- tibble(item=c("#F8766D", "#00BA38", "#619CFF"), count=c(4,5,3))
a <- ggplot(bar_data, aes(x=item, y=count, fill=item)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "none")
ggsave(a, filename="ggplotStandard3.pdf", path="README_files/")
```
